instructions.1: Line 15x10-inch jellyroll pan with foil. Place pretzels in large bowl.
instructions.2: Melt chips with sweetened condensed milk in large saucepan over low heat. Cook and stir constantly until smooth. Pour over pretzels, stirring to coat.
instructions.3: Spread mixture immediately into prepared pan. Sprinkle with dried fruit; press down lightly with back of spoon. Chill 1 to 2 hours or until set. Break into chunks.

questions.question: In Step 2, is the pretzels from Step 1 being used?
Is pretzels from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is pretzels from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to pour the pretzels in Step 2?
